normalized: it was the morning of the seventh day, since i had planted the bug in azuma.

name: azuma
normalized: nhaa… nguuh… nhnn… ngh…
the hunter came to the dining hall much later than usual.

name: azuma
normalized: kuuh… ngh… ukuuh!?
ugh… damn iit…!?
ngh… ngh… kuuh!?
even though she was walking extremely gingerly, while letting moans leak out of her mouth, she was being forced to take small halts due to how furiously she was trembling.
she was being assaulted by the unbearable pleasure of having her clothes rub against her soft skin.
especially her brassiere concealed underneath her jacket, which was bound to be furiously assaulting her inverted nipples as well, considering the fact that they had become permanently erect now.
the throbbing inside her body had surfaced to such an extent that she was sweating profusely not just on her face, but on her entire body.
she was taking deep drags of her brown-coloured cigarette, in her attempts to calm her carnal feelings down, before exhaling a stream of its smoke in front of her body,
almost as if to completely engulf her body in its smoke.

name: cara
normalized: good morning, azuma.

name: azuma
normalized: uuh… yees…
she had smoked the cigarette stub to ashes in an instant, and it had been transformed into nothing but a filter already.

name: kitae
normalized: a very good morning to you.
what is the matter, professor?
for your voice to sound so depressed.

name: azuma
normalized: noo… it's nothing… i just feel kind of stressed…

name: yamakawa
normalized: stressed, you say…?
are you really alright?
it seems like you aren't feeling too well.

name: azuma
normalized: ngh… i'll feel better… when i have some food.
uuh… for starters… let's eat!
she started eating her breakfast, by stuffing her cheeks with it as usual.
however, she placed her chopsticks down, the moment she was done eating,

name: azuma
normalized: haa… uurghyaa!
before roaring out all of a sudden.

name: yamakawa
normalized: w-what is the matter?

name: azuma
normalized: i'm still so frustrateed…!
kuaah!?
what the hell is thiis!?
damn iit…!
she looked down at her own body and muttered that in vexation, while scratching her head furiously.
fufufu… you may be suffering for now, however, you will be able to savour it thoroughly very soon.

name: azuma
normalized: uhuu… sorry for being so loud…
azuma raised her face and apologized to us, after having realized what she had done, before looking at the reserved knight, who was standing beside the queen.

name: azuma
normalized: say… may i… fuuh… borrow you for a while…?

name: marika
normalized: what is it?

name: azuma
normalized: haa… i would like to ask you… a favour…

name: marika
normalized: why should i──

name: cara
normalized: marika, please do it.

name: marika
normalized: ah… yes.
even though the knight was about to refuse azuma's request, she ended up nodding her head reluctantly, the moment the queen ordered her to do so.

name: azuma
normalized: my bad, miss queen… kuh… i'll only be borrowing her for a while though…

name: cara
normalized: it is alright.
you may borrow marika anytime you want.
her servant let a sigh leak out of her mouth, but stopped short of saying anything on the matter, while holding her head in the palm of her hand.

name: azuma
normalized: well then… uuh… i'm off… fuh… as i have my class now…

name: kitae
normalized: i understand.
please don't be too reckless, even if you aren't feeling well.
the hunter gave her a quick response, before leaving the dormitory accompanied by the queen's knight.
however, what the hell was up with azuma asking a favour of marika anyway?
i had never expected the hunter and the queen's knight to work together like this, especially as they didn't get along with each other at all…
well, i need not worry about it too much.
both of them were stupid women anyway, who would undoubtedly start bickering with each other merely by being together.
either way, asking a favour of her was pointless.
my plan was going to progress smoothly regardless of it, as it was almost impossible for both these women to iron out their differences.
and when it did, i would soon have cara.
i had a fleeting glance at the queen, before taking a sip of my coffee.
even though both of them didn't get along with each other, they would undoubtedly pose a risk, if they worked together.

name: yamakawa
normalized: it is time for me to go to the school for my work as well.

name: cara
normalized: hey, yoshiki──

name: kitae
normalized: cara, i need to talk to you for a while.
it is about the hall where the negotiations are going to be held──
the queen was about to stop me, however, kitae interrupted her immediately in order to discuss some important topic with her.
i stepped away from the director, who was merely putting on an act, before lightly nodding to cara and leaving them behind.
did she want the two women to be left alone?
or had she sensed something in me?
either way, i couldn't help but chuckle, after having managed to give the queen the slip.
i followed after azuma and marika, while acting as normal as possible.

name: azuma
normalized: say… i need you to keep me company… and help me relieve my stress…

name: marika
normalized: … have you lost it?

name: azuma
normalized: as if i could lose it…!
ukuh… all i'm telling you to do is… to go all out against me… in order to help me relieve my stress…

name: marika
normalized: either one of us could end up dead though.

name: azuma
normalized: i do expect… the director, as well as miss queen, to give us a good scolding, if that does happen… haa… however, i won't get fired up unless we go about it like that…

name: marika
normalized: very well then.
after all, this was miss cara's command as well.

name: azuma
normalized: hehehe… whatever works for you.
i'm off for now.
i request you to come over there later.
even though the hunter was still trembling due to the assault of her carnal desires, she walked off towards the school with nimble steps, almost as if she had conquered her demons.
i couldn't help but curl the edges of my lips into a sneer, as marika passed by me while heading back to her mistress.
even though both of them had merely planned to spar with each other, it was possible for the bug that had been planted inside azuma's body to die, especially if they clashed with all their strength.
this was quite a serious matter.
however, i could take steps to prevent it, at least now that i knew about it.
i decided to set my collaborator on this side on both the women, so that he could inform me immediately when they did get down to it.
